branchCategory.name: LER, Electric Rotary Table, Continuous Rotation
branchCategory.description: <P>The LER rotary electric actuators feature a rotating worktable positioned above an enclosure for the motor and drivetrain. Three different motor/table sizes are available, with each size offering a basic and high torque variation. Additionally, each size offers four rotating angle options, including 90°, 180°, 310 / 320°, and continuously rotating. </P>

breadCrumb.name: LER, Electric Rotary Table, Continuous Rotation
